sentences.en: Aircraft passed overhead with monotonous regularity .
sentences.cn: 飞机一次又一次反复从头顶飞过。

sentences.en: Climate change is disrupting the regularity of the seasons.
sentences.cn: 气候的变化正在打乱季节的规律性。

sentences.en: Closures and job losses are again being announced with monotonous regularity.
sentences.cn: 倒闭和失业的消息又在一次次地反复宣布着。

sentences.en: Experimenters have succeeded in controlling the rate and regularity of the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 实验者已经成功控制了心跳的速度和频率。

sentences.en: He continued to appear in the office with unfailing regularity thereafter.
sentences.cn: 从那以后他照常出现在办公室，风雨无阻。

sentences.en: He exercised with a regularity that amazed us.
sentences.cn: 他锻炼的规律程度令我们非常惊讶.

sentences.en: He misplaces his reading glasses with such regularity that aides carry extras.
sentences.cn: 他老是记不起把自己阅读时用的放大镜放在什么地方，所以助手们会随身携带备用的。

sentences.en: He only laid on the whip with regularity.
sentences.cn: 他只规律地将马一鞭一鞭地抽着.

sentences.en: Look round the world - observe its order - its regularity - its design.
sentences.cn: 看看周围的世界,注意一下它的秩序、法则和安排.

sentences.en: Sons followed their fathers'trade with a high degree of regularity.
sentences.cn: 大多数情况都是子承父业.

sentences.en: The idea is to maintain the regularity of the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 问题就是要维持心跳的规律性.

sentences.en: The overdraft arrangements had been generous because of the regularity of the half-yearly payments.
sentences.cn: 因为是每半年定期还款，所以透支额度还算高。

sentences.en: The puppet - show was performed with great regularity and decency.
sentences.cn: 木偶戏的演出井然有序,也很规矩.

sentences.en: The regularity of the crystal goes beyond this, however.
sentences.cn: 然而,晶体的规则性不止于此.

sentences.en: The regularity with which this occurs suggests that the process is genetically determined.
sentences.cn: 这种现象出现的规律性表明这个过程是由基因决定的。

sentences.en: The same old favorites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentences.cn: 相同的决心以单调的规律年复一年地出现.

words.tran_cn: 定期的；有规律的；合格的；整齐的
定期地；有规律地；整齐地；匀称地
常客；正式队员；中坚分子
调整；使有秩序；使合法化

trans.tran_cn: 规则性，规律性，整齐，正规，匀称，常规
trans.tran_en: when the same thing keeps happening often, especially with the same amount of time between each occasion when it happens
